name: Adviser Index
tag_list: find-an-ifa, financial-advisers, independent-financial-advisers, mortgage-advisers, ifa-search, ifa, money-forums, request-financial-advice
overview:
Adviser Index is a interactive and dedicated directory of Independent Financial Advisers, Tied Financial Advisers and Mortgage Advisers in the UK and Northern Ireland.

The service allows visitors to find local advisers using their Google Maps based system or by postcode, region or county.

Adviser Index not only provides a directory of financial advisers it also provides free resources for visitors to use such as money advice forums, free financial help guides and a “Request Financial Advice” feature, which allows visitors to submit advice questions to professionals.
